quests.name: The Language of Flowers
objectives: Pick 6 Blue Star Lilies in the Forest with Minnie.
Make sure you have the 6 Blue Star Lilies in your inventory
Bring the Blue Star Lilies to Minnie
Gather the following items to Craft Minnie's Flower Arrangement.

-1 Minnie's Special Flower Pot
  ‧ 1 White & Red Hydrangea
  ‧ 4 Red Bell Flower
  ‧ 6 Blue Star Lily
Craft Minnie's Flower Arrangement.
Talk to Minnie
Deliver Minnie's Flower Arrangement to Mickey on Minnie's behalf.
Return to Minnie

quests.name: On The Trail of Minnie's Memory
objectives: Bring the Dreamlight Magnifier to the Sparkling
Interact with the Sparkling Fishing Pole.
Talk to Minnie
Find another lost Memory on the Beach using the Dreamlight Magnifier.
Interact with the floating Sparkling Hat.
Talk to Minnie
Investigate the Forest of Valor to find another Lost Memory using the Dreamlight Magnifier.
Interact with the floating Sparkling Package.
Talk to Minnie
Go see Mickey with Minnie.
Listen as Minnie talks to Mickey.
Talk to Mickey
Talk to Minnie

quests.name: Remembering Old Times
objectives:
Gather the following items to craft a Rustic Clock Tower.
  ‧ 100 Stone
  ‧ 100 Hardwood
  ‧ 30 Iron Ingot
  ‧ 200 Clay
Talk to Minnie.
Craft a Rustic Clock Tower.
Place the Rustic Clock Tower somewhere in the Village.
Return to Minnie

quests.name: The Club Renewal
objectives: Investigate the Glade of Trust for a long-lost banner.
Go talk to Minnie about it.

Gather the following items to craft the Cheerful Chums Club Banner.
  ‧ 20 Fabric
  ‧ 10 Gold Nugget
  ‧ Craft a Red Dye
Craft the Cheerful Chums Banner
Go to your House
Place the Cheerful Chums Club Banner in a nice spot of your choosing in your House.
Relaunch the Cheerful Chums Club.
Go talk to Minnie about the Club.

quests.name: Very Magical Minnie
objectives:
You found a tattered old spellbook with sticky notes throughout covered in Minnie's handwriting.
  ‧ Return the Borrowed Spellbook to Minnie.
Talk to Merlin about Minnie's predicament.
Talk to Moana.
Talk to Anna.
Talk to Elsa.

Gather everything you'll need for Merlin's Enchantment:
  ‧ Dream Shard (6)
Gather Dream Shard (6) to finish Merlin's spell.
Return to Merlin to complete the spell.
Talk to Minnie.
